# Richard Hocking

'''Richard Boyle O'Reilly Hocking''' (26 August, 1906 â€“ 11 March, 2001) was an American philosopher and a professor of philosophy at Emory University. He was the son of William Ernest Hocking and grandson of John Boyle O'Reilly. He was a president of the Metaphysical Society of America (1970).
